name: chunked-file-upload
description: The mono repo for containing the projects developed for the chunked file upload (POC).

scripts.install-dependencies: cd front-end && yarn install && cd ../back-end && mvn install
scripts.build: cd front-end && yarn build && cd ../back-end && make
scripts.clean: cd front-end && yarn clean && cd ../back-end && make clean

author: Nicholas Adamou
